title: Some Pixel 6 owners say haptic vibrations are weaker following the Android 12L update
content:
The March 2022 update for Pixel 6 and Pixel 6 Pro was delayed for weeks, after just rolling out a few days ago. However, it seems that some bugs have stuck around despite the delay, as some Pixel 6 owners are reporting that haptic vibrations feel weaker following the Android 12L update.

moreâ€¦

The post Some Pixel 6 owners say haptic vibrations are weaker following the Android 12L update appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: According to some users, the haptic vibration feedback on Pixel 6 and Pixel 6 Pro is weaker following the Android 12L update.
